alert.note: Alert for Butte; Glenn (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 06 at 3:49PM PST until March 06 at 4:30PM PST by NWS Sacramento
info.description: The National Weather Service in Sacramento has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... West central Butte County in northern California... Northeastern Glenn County in central California... * Until 430 PM PST. * At 349 PM PST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Nord, or 8 miles east of Orland, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Nord and Hamilton City. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Prepare immediately for large hail and deadly cloud to ground lightning. Seek shelter inside a well-built structure. Stay away from windows.
